FuncDef: The display sdn openflow statistics command displays statistics about the OpenFlow connection packets. The display sdn openflow statistics command displays statistics about the OpenFlow connection packets. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display sdn openflow statistics [ controller [ vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] { <ipv4-address> | <ipv6-address> } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the VPN instance that the controller belongs to.
The value must be the name of an existing VPN instance.

Specifies the controller's IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the controller's IPv6 address.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.
